actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to make certain technical and perfecting amendments to the Education Amendments of 1974 (Public Law 93-380).

summary.text: Makes specified technical and perfecting amendments to the Education Amendments of 1974. Extends reporting dates of specified surveys and studies of the Commissioner of Education, including the survey of career education programs, from November 1, 1975 to February 1, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to make certain technical and perfecting amendments to the Education Amendments of 1974 (Public Law 93-380).
